Package com.percussion.utils.security

Interface Summary
IPSPrincipalAttribute Repesents a named attribute of a subject that may be retrieved by a call to Subject.getPrincipals(IPSPrincipalAttribute).
IPSRoleCataloger A role cataloger is used by Rhythmyx to determine the membership of a role for such purposes as role based email notification.
IPSSubjectCataloger A subject cataloger is used by Rhythmyx to find any or all subjects from a source, and also to obtain specific information about a named subject.
IPSTypedPrincipal Represents a principal with a specified type.
 

Class Summary
PSEncrypter Utility class to encrypt and decrypt strings using the Blowfish cipher with a secret shared key.
 

Enum Summary
IPSPrincipalAttribute.PrincipalAttributes Types of attributes that can be returned in a subject's collection of principals.
IPSTypedPrincipal.PrincipalTypes Types of principals that may be represented.
 

Exception Summary
PSSecurityCatalogException Exception class used to indicate errors when cataloging subjects.
